Provo.Provo River:
The Provo River is located in Utah County and Wasatch County, Utah, in the United States. It rises in the Uinta Mountains at Washington Lake and flows about 70 miles (110 km) southwest to Utah Lake at the city of Provo, Utah.


== Course ==
The two main branches of Provo River are North Fork Provo River and South Fork Provo River.
